lines.text: [Ben is asked his name after having tried to leave the scene several times]
Well, if it wasn't for you, Guv'nor, it'd be Ben Bolt.
Will you see me safely home, guv'nor, if I gives you a nice wedding present, eh?
It's like the pictures, isn't it?
Ya don't have to do nothin' in this 'ere house - ya stand still and things happen!
Oh! Oh, Gawd! Oh, Gawd! Oh, Gawd! Oh!
How do you feel? Now, where's that candle? Here, have some of this.
What have you got in your pockets?
